markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Diviner's Nose Chain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=855)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The diviner's nose chain is worn by attaching piercings to the ear and nose, creating a connection between the senses of hearing and smell. The diviner's nose chain grants you [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) out to 30 feet as an [imprecise sense](/Rules.aspx?ID=412), and a +1 item bonus to checks to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) or [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=85).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Diviner's Nose Chain
